changeSet.author: dev
changeSet.createView: SELECT CR."recipeId", C."categoryId", C."name" FROM public.category C JOIN public.category_recipe CR ON CR."categoryId" = C."categoryId"

changeSet.author: dev
changeSet.createView: SELECT R."recipeId", R."title", R."description", R."preparationTime", R."image", R."difficultyLevel", S."views", R."createdBy" (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM rating WHERE "recipeId" = R."recipeId") rating, (SELECT json_agg(json_build_object('categoryId', "categoryId", 'name', "name")) FROM public."RecipeCategories" WHERE "recipeId"=R."recipeId")::text categories FROM public.recipe AS R JOIN public.stat AS S ON (S."recipeId" = R."recipeId") GROUP BY R."recipeId", R."title", R."description", R."preparationTime", R."difficultyLevel", S."views"

changeSet.author: dev
changeSet.createView: SELECT I."recipeId", I."ingredientId", A."articleName", A."description", A."alcoholVolume", U."symbol", I."quantity" FROM public.ingredient AS I JOIN public.article A ON A."articleId" = I."articleId" JOIN public.unit U ON U."unitId" = I."unitId"

changeSet.author: dev
changeSet.createView: SELECT R."recipeId", R."title", R."description", R."preparationSteps", R."preparationTime", R."difficultyLevel", R."image", S."views", (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM rating WHERE "recipeId" = R."recipeId") rating FROM public.recipe AS R JOIN public.category_recipe AS CR ON (R."recipeId" = CR."recipeId") JOIN public.stat AS S ON (S."recipeId" = R."recipeId") GROUP BY R."recipeId", R."title", R."description", R."preparationSteps", R."preparationTime", R."difficultyLevel", R."image", S."views"
